unstructured.content: We're a small software company specializing in financial transaction processing systems. We need appropriate professional liability coverage for software errors and omissions.
Data security is a major concern since we handle financial information. We need a cyber liability policy that covers potential breaches and notification costs.
We're currently carrying a $2M professional liability policy with a $25K deductible. We haven't had any claims in the past five years.
Our office is leased, so we need appropriate coverage for our business property, primarily computer equipment and office furniture valued at approximately $750K.
We're planning to expand our team by about 20 people in the next year, so we need to make sure our coverage scales appropriately with our growth.
